name: Costume email study
description:
Hello everyone

I'm very bad at coding, so I created a custom email by designing it in figma and exporting into html with the help of a plug in.


The plug in i use for this

  1. Emailify from Figmatic
  2. Marka email generator from Grigoriy Mashkovtsev


All in Figma community



Read me!

the above content is not intended to support human trafficking, promoting for violence or hatred against a particular individual or group.


photos of people in the content above, they are all my friends, I don't hate them in real life I love them as my best friend.


We are such a family.


@fromrha
